title: Intro to Astrophysics
description: This course provides an overview of modern astrophysics including stars, galaxies, black holes and other dense stellar remnants, and the physics of the expanding Universe.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Levels:
__HEADER_1__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (PHYS 2212 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or PHYS 2232 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) and PHYS 2213 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
